name: Beat The Traffic
description:
Simple Procedural Driving Game That Requires Precise Timing and Reaction.

Created in 1 month for ProcJam contest using Unity and 3ds max.

The procedural parts in this game include:

   - Procedural gameplay progression which increases in difficulty during gameplay.

   - Procedural vehicle variations and color schemes.

   - Procedural traffic spawning, speeds and car spacing.

   - Procedural map layout.

   - Randomized sound tones.

This all makes for a unique gameplay experience every single time.

HD version downloadable: https://drive.google.com/drive/folders/1DAK2Xt9f9FefUDOdCWXiZtL1G7z5e5jP?usp=sha...
